definition: sound/noise/note (of musical scale)/tone/news/syllable/reading (phonetic value of a character)
echo/sound/noise/to make a sound/to sound/to ring/loud/classifier for noises
to set up/to arrange/to establish/to found/to display
to prepare/get ready/to provide or equip

sentences.english: Attica is defined by avantgarde design and top-notch sound from a world-class system.
sentences.chinese: 愛奇多被評爲設計前衛且音響設備頂尖的俱樂部。

sentences.english: And in retail, music devices are different from plasma TVs.
sentences.chinese: 而在零售業，音響設備不同於等離子電視。

sentences.english: Both the light and sound equipments are the state-of -art.
sentences.chinese: 燈光與音響設備都是最尖端的。

sentences.english: B： That's because you can afford good stereo equipment.
sentences.chinese: 那是因爲你買得起好的音響設備。

sentences.english: Cadmium-based photo-resistors used in professional audio equipment.
sentences.chinese: 專業音響設備中，光電阻所含的鎘。

sentences.english: The first one was a small audio components manufacturer.
sentences.chinese: 第一家是一個小型音響設備製造公司。

sentences.english: That's because you can afford good stereo equipment.
sentences.chinese: 那是因爲你買得起好的音響設備。

sentences.english: As such, it was used in huge volumes of Japanese audio equipment.
sentences.chinese: 因此，它被用來在浩如煙海的日本音響設備。

sentences.english: The studio is being wired for sound.
sentences.chinese: 這個播音室正在安裝音響設備用的電線。

definition: lit. to draw a gourd from the model (idiom)/fig. to copy sth mechanically without attempt at originality
